item.title: Recent brewday: 'Locked Down and Bitter ESB'
item.description: My friend Tom and I were recently bemoaning the fact pubs are still shut for this third, interminable lock-down, and that despite the fact a lot of really good canned beer is available, we would actually quite like a decent pint of British ale.

item.title: My notes from Real World Crypto 2021
item.description: I eventually got round to tidying up my notes from this year’s RWC Symposium.

item.title: Tuesday spent mainly outside
item.description: Things I did today bought some ingredients so the girl can make a cake went to B&Q to buy some nice new wood drillbits.

item.title: Fairly lazy Monday
item.description: Things I did today build SuperCollider v3 from source, because there’s no APK of it for my old Ubuntu 14.

item.title: Busy Tuesday
item.description: Back to Paul-40%-form, got a shitton of stuff done today.

item.title: Travelling down from the Peak District
item.description: Photos from the area around Bakewell / Chatsworth to follow.

item.title: Work outing to Bletchley Park
item.description: Nice day trip up to Bletchley with Martin and David.

item.title: Bank Holiday Monday during half-term
item.description: School half term We were in Norfolk.

item.title: Crafting a new synth patch
item.description: Things I did with my 40% time today watched a tutorialby Quincas ('SynthDIYGuy' on Youtube) showing how to craft a classic Moog-esque patch on the Erica Synths DIY kits tried to reproduce this on my Befaco rig.

item.title: Noises You Can Make With A VCF
item.description: Things I did with my 40% time today Crafted a pretty silly patch on the Befaco Rig.

item.title: Tuesday
item.description: Things I did with my 40% time today took girl to school had a coffee at Blackbird bakery in CP walked in the CP park to see the dinosaurs bought some PTFE plumbers tape for dripping sink fixed the dripping sink did not update this blog :( built my Befaco HexVCA.

item.title: Thursday
item.description: Unexpected 40% time today Miranda is sick with sore throat, etc.

item.title: Tuesday
item.description: Things I did with my 40% time today fixed the Befaco VC ADSR the embarrassing cause of it’s not-workingness was that (again) I’d forgotten to solder some of the front panel connectors :-/ now the trigger button correctly launches the full Attack-Decay-Sustain-Release cycle had the realisation that a VCO and this ADSR is not enough to shape sound - the ADSR is generating an envelope control signal that something else must apply to the audio path.

item.title: Monday
item.description: Things I did with my 40% time today went for a 6km run with Rachel finished building my Befaco MIDI thing module for the mid-life-crisis project this one wasn’t very hard and seemed to work first time.

item.title: Tuesday
item.description: Things I did with my 40% time today 30 mins yoga routine using an Android app I just discovered; followed by some headspace finished building the Befaco Even VCO walked 3.
Things I did with my 40% time today This was the last day of our Easter break, and Oscar was still on holiday due to an Inset day at school (Miranda was back at school, which left her feeling miffed)
